replies.msg:
你收到此信是因為你已從Apple Online Store/ Apple Mobile App購買了一個或多個受管制電器設備（REE）。

本收據所列的產品，是《產品環保責任條例》（第603章）所指的受管制電器。蘋果或其供應商就該條例支付該產品的循環再造徵費：

電腦 或 列印機（≦30Kg）：每部$15
顯示器：每部$45

如顧客選擇舊電器的免費移服務，請在購買後3內到蘋果指定回收商(俐通)網站 http://appleprs.re-teck.com 安排蘋果除舊服務/

You are receiving this letter because you have purchased one or more Regulated Electrical Equipment(s) (REE) from Apple Online Store/ Apple Mobile App.

According to the Producer Responsibility Scheme under Hong Kong Environmental Production Department, a product set out in this receipt may be Regulated Electrical Equipment (REE) under the Product Eco-responsibility Ordinance(Cap. 603). The Ordinance imposes a recycling levy on the REE product, paid by Apple or its suppliers, as follows:

Computer or Printer (≦30Kg): $15 per item
Monitor: $45 per item

Please visit http://appleprs.re-teck.com within 3 days of purchase to learn more and arrange free removal of old device with Apple’s recycling partner (Li Tong Recycling)
